slide1.title: Structural Advantage of a Small Fund
slide1.description: The fund’s size enables faster execution, targeted deal access, and active oversight — benefits not typically available to larger institutional vehicles.

slide2.title: Regulated and Globally Positioned
slide2.description: Vertex FinCapital operates under the Singapore VCC framework and is managed by MAS-licensed XEQ Capital, providing legal clarity, investor protection, and international credibility.

slide3.title: Aligned Profit Distribution Model
slide3.description: Investors receive the first 12% p.a. of returns. Only after this threshold is met does the fund share in profits, ensuring investor-first economics at the structural level

slide4.title:
Fee Discipline
and Alignment
slide4.description: The fund applies a flat 2% management fee (covering all operating expenses) and performance fees only apply above a 12% return, ensuring investor-aligned incentives.

slide5.title:
Selective
Participation
slide5.description: The investor base is intentionally capped at 20–30 parties to preserve deal quality and access discipline.
